text: Martín Mallo (born 20 July 1950) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Martín Mallo
